mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER_SKILL (ID, MEMBER_ID, SKILL_LIST_ID) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER_SKILL.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{skillListId})
mapper.select: SELECT MS.ID, MS.MEMBER_ID, MS.SKILL_LIST_ID, SL.ID, SL.SKILL FROM TBL_MEMBER_SKILL MS JOIN TBL_SKILL_LIST SL ON MS.SKILL_LIST_ID = SL.ID WHERE MS.MEMBER_ID=#{memberId}
